Posted By: eric p.
i am currently selling these cards in one lot: n172 sid farrar gai 2.5 (the card is awesome but has back damage) the photo is one of the best i have ever seen, n172 slattery (very nice as well, wow), n175 gypsy queen yank robinson brown's champ gai 1.5, n173 obrien (very nice but has 2 punch holes at the top), $1350 for the group.

CARDS ARE SOLD!
